name: Boss Fight (Jyunaut)
description:
A/D - Move

Space - Jump

W/S - Hold for directional attacks (Up,  Down)

LMB / J - Light Attack (L)

RMB / K - Heavy Attack (H)

Left Shift - Dodge

Q/E/F - Parry

Combo Sets:

Ground

  • Light Slash 1: L
  • Light Slash 2: L>L
  • Light Slash 3: L>L>L
  • <WIP> Gun Fire: H (Multi-Tap)
  • <WIP> Gun Fire Laser: H (Hold for 1 sec)>Release
  • Double Slash: L>H
  • Pin Wheel: L>H>L
  • <WIP> Blast: L>H>L>H
  • <WIP> Double Shot: L>H>H
  • Triple Stab: L>L>H
  • Smash: L>L>H>L
  • Spread: L>L>H>L>H
  • <WIP> Triple Pierce: L>L>H>H
  • Heavy Slash: L>L>L>H
  • Barrel Dodge: L>L>L>H>L
  • <WIP> Heavy Assault: L>L>L>H>H (Spawn Cannon)
  • Up Slash: Up+H
  • Dash Slash: Dodge+H
  • Parry: Parry
  • Heavy Swing: Parry (Charge for 2 sec / On Successful Parry

Air

  • Air Light Slash 1: L
  • Air Light Slash 2: L>L
  • Air Light Slash 3: L>L>L
  • <WIP> Gun Fire (Air): H
  • <WIP> Gun Fire Laser (Air): H (Hold for 1 sec)>Release
  • <Animation WIP> Pass Through: L>H
  • <WIP> Propel: L>H>H
  • <WIP> Rising Slash: L>L>H
  • <WIP> Cannon Knock-up: L>L>H>L
  • <WIP> Cannon Blast: L>L>H>L>H (Throws away cannon -> Deals damage)
  • <WIP> Sky Blast: L>L>H>H
  • <Mechanics WIP> Heavy Slam: L>L>L>H (Hold for 1 sec)>Release
  • <WIP> Double Spin: L>L>L>H
  • <WIP> Dive Slash: L>L>L>H>L
  • <WIP> Izuna Drop: L>L>L>H>H
  • Windmill: (During Fast Fall) L
  • Air Spear: (During Fast Fall) H
  • Fast Fall: (Double Tap Down)
  • Punch Slam: Down+H
  • Up Slash (Air): Up+H
